name: Prime Minister's Questions: The Game
description:
Do your Wednesdays feel joyless and empty when Parliament's in recess? Does 12 o'clock pass without event, leaving you deflated and depressed?

Prime Minister's Questions is every political nut's favourite time of the week and we all deserve to enjoy it whenever we want.

Behold, PRIME MINISTER'S QUESTIONS: THE GAME. Play as the prime minister in this satirical, retro style game as he faces his weekly grilling from Her Majesty's Most Loyal Opposition.
